SB

StationBoard

GitHub

Swiss Public Transport Display for Home

Bring the train station departure board to your home or office. Get accurate real-time departure times right where you need them.

How It Works

1

Flash Firmware

Connect your ESP32 via USB and click the flash button above

2

Configure WiFi

Connect to the "Stationboard-AP" network and set up your stations

3

Enjoy!

Your StationBoard will display live departures automatically

Features

Real-Time Departures

Live Swiss public transport data for trains, buses, trams, and boats. Never miss your connection again.

Dual Station Support

Configure two stations and switch between them with a double-click. Perfect for commuters.

5 Brightness Levels

From power-saving sleep mode to full brightness. Automatic night mode from 22:00 to 06:00.

BTC Price Ticker

Optional cryptocurrency price display in the footer for the crypto enthusiasts.

WiFi Configuration

Easy setup via smartphone captive portal. No computer required for configuration.

OTA Updates

Wireless firmware updates via web browser. Keep your device up to date effortlessly.

<1W
Power Consumption
Swiss
Made Quality
Open
Source

Hardware Requirements

ESP32-2432S028R (CYD - "Cheap Yellow Display")

  • ESP32 with integrated 2.8" ILI9341 TFT display (320x240)
  • Built-in boot button for controls
  • USB power supply (5V)
  • 2.4 GHz WiFi network

Flash Your StationBoard
